sel_pin.docs:
**[Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The pin SEL is connected to.

*See also: [HLW8012 Power Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/hlw8012.html#configuration-variables)*

cf_pin.docs:
**[Pin](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin)**: The pin CF is connected to.

*See also: [HLW8012 Power Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/hlw8012.html#configuration-variables)*

cf1_pin.docs:
**[Pin](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin)**: The pin CF1 is connected to.

*See also: [HLW8012 Power Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/hlw8012.html#configuration-variables)*

voltage.docs:
Use the voltage value of the sensor in V (RMS). All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [HLW8012 Power Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/hlw8012.html#configuration-variables)*

current.docs:
Use the current value of the sensor in amperes. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [HLW8012 Power Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/hlw8012.html#configuration-variables)*

power.docs:
Use the (active) power value of the sensor in watts. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [HLW8012 Power Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/hlw8012.html#configuration-variables)*

energy.docs:
Use the total energy value of the sensor in Wh. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [HLW8012 Power Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/hlw8012.html#configuration-variables)*

current_resistor.docs:
**float**: The value of the shunt resistor for current measurement. Defaults to the Sonoff POW’s value `0.001 ohm`.

*See also: [HLW8012 Power Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/hlw8012.html#configuration-variables)*

voltage_divider.docs:
**float**: The value of the voltage divider on the board as `(R_upstream + R_downstream) / R_downstream`. Defaults to the Sonoff POW’s value `2351`.

*See also: [HLW8012 Power Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/hlw8012.html#configuration-variables)*

model.docs:
**string**: The sensor model on the board, to set internal constant factors to convert pulses to measurements. Possible values are `HLW8012`, `CSE7759`, `BL0937`. Defaults to `HLW8012`. CSE7759 uses same constants and it also works with default. Must be set for BL0937 to be able to calibrate all three measurements at the same time.

*See also: [HLW8012 Power Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/hlw8012.html#configuration-variables)*

change_mode_every.docs:
**int**: After how many updates to cycle between the current/voltage measurement mode. Note that the first value after switching is discarded because it is often inaccurate. When set to `"never"` the measurement mode will stay at the set `initial_mode`. Defaults to `8`.

*See also: [HLW8012 Power Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/hlw8012.html#configuration-variables)*

initial_mode.docs:
**string**: The initial measurement mode. Defaults to `VOLTAGE`. Possible initial measurement modes are `VOLTAGE` or `CURRENT`.

*See also: [HLW8012 Power Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/hlw8012.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [HLW8012 Power Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/hlw8012.html#configuration-variables)*
